resources.string: Welcome to Word of the day Page
Welcome to Save your word Page
Failed to get meaning of the word

"Greetings! We're glad to have you here. Here's a simple guide to get started:
" "
" "1. Simply type in your preferred username in the username input field.
" "2. Click on the "Search" button to find the meaning of the the you entered.
" "3. To go back to the Home Page click "HOME" button
" "4. For the Word of the Day quiz, click on the "Yuvraj" button.
" "5. To view your saved words, click on the "Muskan" button." "
" "That's all there is to it! Enjoy exploring the different features of our page. If you have any inquiries or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us for assistance."
